name: Ultimate Puffle Overload 4 Chapter 1 Complete Demo
name_original: Ultimate Puffle Overload 4 Chapter 1 Complete Demo
description:
Ultimate Puffle Overload X Danganronpa.

Story is Similer To Danganronpa But The Amount Of People In The Game Is Smaller And The Game Won't Have A Ending Like Any Danganronpa Game, This Game's Ending Will Take A Twist Danganronpa 2 Never Did Involving Memory's.

Also This Game Has Free Time Events!

Locations Returning From Danganronpa 1, Need To Be Retextured(Currently Google Png's:

Locker Rooms.

Bed Rooms.

Mixed Bath.

Upcoming Chapter 2 New Locations:

Underground Bunker.

Underground Bunker Bathroom.

Underground Bunker Armory.
